mcp.json
VScode Format
{
	"servers": {
		"blenderMCP": {
			"type": "stdio",
			"command": "uvx",
			"args": [
				"blender-mcp"
			]
		}
	},
	"inputs": []
}

Android Studio (Jetbrains)
https://developer.android.com/studio/gemini/add-mcp-server?hl=de
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "memory": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": [
        "-y",
        "@modelcontextprotocol/server-memory"
      ]
    }
  }
}

Claude Desktop (BlenderMCP example)
{
    "mcpServers": {

            "command": "uvx",
            "args": [

            ]
        }
    }
}
